name: Outtrigger
description: Outtrigger (アウトトリガー) is a first-person shooter & third-person shooter video game developed by Sega AM2 for the Sega NAOMI arcade cabinet and the Dreamcast. The game was originally released in 1999 for the Arcade and was later ported over to the Dreamcast in 2001 where supported online play for up to six players was added in, however this function was taken out of the European version before release. The game also can be played from either a first-person or a third-person perspective.
